title: Last Authentic Harry Potter Font to Identify !! HELP !!
content:
With the help of Mark Simonson and a few Harry Potter enthusiasts at the DeskTopPublishing Forum I was able to identify all the authentic fonts used in the Harry Potter Books... EXCEPT THIS ONE.

Is it even a font ? If you would like to see more of the lettering... I've posted it here: [http://www.geocities.com/tatesha/HarryPotterAF.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317182511/http:/www.geocities.com/tatesha/HarryPotterAF.html "http://www.geocities.com/tatesha/HarryPotterAF.html")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [elusive.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317182511/http:/typophile.com/files/elusive.gif) | 5.83 KB |
author: tatesha

comments.content:
